source:
'use client'; export default function AdminTerms() { return (

Pulse Connect Admin Terms and Conditions

🚨 Important Notice

As an administrator of Pulse Connect, you are being granted significant privileges and responsibilities. Please read these terms carefully before accepting.

1. Administrator Responsibilities

  • Maintain the confidentiality of your admin access code
  • Use admin privileges only for legitimate business purposes
  • Never share your admin credentials with others
  • Report any security concerns immediately
  • Follow all data protection and privacy guidelines

2. Access and Security

  • Your admin code grants full access to Pulse Connect systems
  • All actions are logged and monitored
  • Unauthorized access attempts will be investigated
  • Regular security audits will be conducted

3. Data Protection

  • Handle user data with utmost confidentiality
  • Follow GDPR and other applicable privacy laws
  • Do not export or download sensitive information unnecessarily
  • Report any data breaches immediately

4. Code of Conduct

  • Maintain professional behavior at all times
  • Do not abuse admin privileges
  • Respect user privacy
  • Follow company policies and procedures

5. Termination

  • Admin access can be revoked at any time
  • Violation of terms will result in immediate access termination
  • Legal action may be taken for serious violations
); }

source: export const MAX_ADMINS = 8;

// English language strings
export default {
  welcome: "Welcome to Pulse Connect!",
  upgrade: "Upgrade Your Plan",
  viewPlans: "View Plans",
  tip: "Love Pulse Connect? Cover hosting costs with a tip.",
  complaintPlaceholder: "Describe an issue...",
  feedbackPlaceholder: "Share feedback...",
  submit: "Submit",
  send: "Send",
  complaintReceived: "Complaint received!",
  feedbackReceived: "Thank you!",
  unlockFeatures: "Unlock More Features",
  upgradeNow: "Upgrade Now",
  remindMeLater: "Remind Me Later",
  // ...add more as needed
};

import { Locale } from '@/types/i18n';

// Language display names in their native form
export const LANGUAGE_NAMES: Record<Locale, string> = {
  'ar': 'العربية',      // Arabic
  'bn': 'বাংলা',        // Bengali
  'de': 'Deutsch',      // German
  'en': 'English',      // English
  'es': 'Español',      // Spanish
  'fr': 'Français',     // French
  'hi': 'हिन्दी',        // Hindi
  'id': 'Bahasa Indonesia', // Indonesian
  'it': 'Italiano',     // Italian
  'ja': '日本語',       // Japanese
  'ko': '한국어',       // Korean
  'ms': 'Bahasa Melayu', // Malay
  'nl': 'Nederlands',   // Dutch
  'pt': 'Português',    // Portuguese
  'ru': 'Русский',      // Russian
  'th': 'ไทย',         // Thai
  'tr': 'Türkçe',      // Turkish
  'uk': 'Українська',   // Ukrainian
  'vi': 'Tiếng Việt',  // Vietnamese
  'zh': '中文',         // Chinese
};

// RTL (Right-to-Left) languages
export const RTL_LOCALES = new Set(['ar']);

// Language regions for date, number, and currency formatting
export const LOCALE_REGION_MAPPING: Record<Locale, string> = {
  'ar': 'ar-SA',     // Arabic (Saudi Arabia)
  'bn': 'bn-IN',     // Bengali (India)
  'de': 'de-DE',     // German (Germany)
  'en': 'en-US',     // English (United States)
  'es': 'es-ES',     // Spanish (Spain)
  'fr': 'fr-FR',     // French (France)
  'hi': 'hi-IN',     // Hindi (India)
  'id': 'id-ID',     // Indonesian (Indonesia)
  'it': 'it-IT',     // Italian (Italy)
  'ja': 'ja-JP',     // Japanese (Japan)
  'ko': 'ko-KR',     // Korean (South Korea)
  'ms': 'ms-MY',     // Malay (Malaysia)
  'nl': 'nl-NL',     // Dutch (Netherlands)
  'pt': 'pt-BR',     // Portuguese (Brazil)
  'ru': 'ru-RU',     // Russian (Russia)
  'th': 'th-TH',     // Thai (Thailand)
  'tr': 'tr-TR',     // Turkish (Turkey)
  'uk': 'uk-UA',     // Ukrainian (Ukraine)
  'vi': 'vi-VN',     // Vietnamese (Vietnam)
  'zh': 'zh-CN',     // Chinese (China)
};

// Time zones commonly associated with each locale
export const DEFAULT_TIMEZONES: Record<Locale, string> = {
  'ar': 'Asia/Riyadh',
  'bn': 'Asia/Kolkata',
  'de': 'Europe/Berlin',
  'en': 'America/New_York',
  'es': 'Europe/Madrid',
  'fr': 'Europe/Paris',
  'hi': 'Asia/Kolkata',
  'id': 'Asia/Jakarta',
  'it': 'Europe/Rome',
  'ja': 'Asia/Tokyo',
  'ko': 'Asia/Seoul',
  'ms': 'Asia/Kuala_Lumpur',
  'nl': 'Europe/Amsterdam',
  'pt': 'America/Sao_Paulo',
  'ru': 'Europe/Moscow',
  'th': 'Asia/Bangkok',
  'tr': 'Europe/Istanbul',
  'uk': 'Europe/Kiev',
  'vi': 'Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh',
  'zh': 'Asia/Shanghai',
};

// Swahili language strings
export default {
  welcome: "Karibu Pulse Connect!",
  upgrade: "Boresha Mpango Wako",
  viewPlans: "Angalia Mipango",
  tip: "Penda Pulse Connect? Changia gharama za mwenyeji.",
  complaintPlaceholder: "Eleza tatizo...",
  feedbackPlaceholder: "Toa maoni...",
  submit: "Tuma",
  send: "Tuma",
  complaintReceived: "Malalamiko yamepokelewa!",
  feedbackReceived: "Asante!",
  unlockFeatures: "Fungua Vipengele Zaidi",
  upgradeNow: "Boresha Sasa",
  remindMeLater: "Nikumbushe Baadaye",
  // ...add more as needed
};

// Zulu language strings
export default {
  welcome: "Siyakwamukela ku-Pulse Connect!",
  upgrade: "Thuthukisa Uhlelo Lwakho",
  viewPlans: "Buka Izinhlelo",
  tip: "Uyathanda i-Pulse Connect? Xhasa izindleko zokusingathwa ngeminikelo.",
  complaintPlaceholder: "Chaza inkinga...",
  feedbackPlaceholder: "Yabelana ngempendulo...",
  submit: "Thumela",

  feedbackReceived: "Ngiyabonga!",
  unlockFeatures: "Vula Izici Eziningi",
  upgradeNow: "Thuthukisa Manje",

  // ...add more as needed
};

source:
import { z } from 'zod';

export const UserRole = z.enum(['USER', 'HOST', 'ADMIN', 'SUPER_ADMIN']);
export type UserRole = z.infer<typeof UserRole>;

export const PermissionScope = z.enum([
  'listings:read',
  'listings:write',
  'listings:delete',
  'bookings:read',
  'bookings:write',
  'bookings:manage',
  'payments:read',
  'payments:write',
  'users:read',
  'users:write',
  'settings:read',
  'settings:write',
  'analytics:read',
  'admin:full'
]);
export type PermissionScope = z.infer<typeof PermissionScope>;

export const ROLE_PERMISSIONS: Record<UserRole, PermissionScope[]> = {
  USER: ['listings:read', 'bookings:read', 'bookings:write', 'payments:write'],
  HOST: [
    'listings:read',
    'listings:write',
    'bookings:read',
    'bookings:manage',
    'payments:read',
    'analytics:read'
  ],
  ADMIN: [
    'listings:read',
    'listings:write',
    'listings:delete',
    'bookings:read',
    'bookings:manage',
    'payments:read',
    'users:read',
    'settings:read',
    'analytics:read'
  ],
  SUPER_ADMIN: ['admin:full']
};

suggestions.desc: Add comment inside empty block statement.
